basic.floral_language:
Paeonia suffruticosa 
Floriography: sincere, pure and beautiful 
Paeonia suffruticosa is elegant, with the reputation of being "the king of flowers", is the city flower of Luoyang. 
Peony has a large size and beautiful flower appearance. The color is various and it is fragrant. Layered petals is magnificence. Peony is national beauty and heavenly fragrance, with a long history which is through the ages praise peony emerge in endlessly, the beauty of poetry was deeply loved by people all over the world. 
Paeonia suffruticosa like sunshine, natural flowering from April to May, with viewing window for 1 to 2 weeks each flower. When flowers are dying, cut withered flowers and leaves, waiting for spouting next spring.
basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, viewing period 1-2 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Long-day plant, likes sunshine, but avoid strong sunlight in summer at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased, dead leaves and withered flowers timely
